style_guide.visual_style: Bright, friendly animated style with warm pastel colors (soft pinks, yellows, blues). Clean, modern aesthetic with a cheerful and welcoming mood. Simple character designs with expressive faces that emphasize approachability and friendliness.
style_guide.segment_story: A female character approaches and strikes up a friendly conversation with a male character in a casual cafe setting. She asks getting-to-know-you questions (name, age, hobbies, compliments his clothing) and then suggests becoming friends over coffee. The scene shows their initial meeting progressing from curious introduction to friendly invitation.
